title: Has Bob Dylan ever had a number one hit? - Quora

response.answer_text: As a singer or as a songwriter? As a singer his only No.1 hit single was this year 2020 when the 17 minute song “Murder Most Foul” topped the Billboard Rock Digital Song Sales category. He has had more success as a writer though. Peter, Paul and Mary took “Blowin’ in the Wind” to number 1 in 1963, the Byrds did it also with “Mr. Tambourine Man” in 1966 and Manfred Mann topped the UK chart in 1968 with “The Mighty Quinn”

Like a Rolling Stone in July 1965 was #2 on Billboard & #1 on Cashbox. It was #1 on UK charts. Earlier this year a new 17 minute long song, Murder Most Foul, debuted at #1 on Billboard digital, first time for him.
